ValidationRule.description: GTMS-26117: Created as part of Partners H1 project to throw error if Influence Payout Fee field is empty when Influence Payout Model is selected as Flat Rate
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISPICKVAL( Influence_Payout_Model__c ,'Flat Rate'), OR( ISNULL( Influence_Payout_Fee__c ), Influence_Payout_Fee__c <= 0 )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You’ve selected ‘Flat Rate’ for the Influence Payout Model, but have not included the desired fee amount. Please update the 'Influence Flat Fee” to a number greater than 0 to save this program
